mapper.select: SELECT c.name AS categoryName, IFNULL(SUM(t.amount), 0) AS totalIncome FROM t_category c LEFT JOIN T_TRANSACTION t ON t.cid = c.id and YEAR (t.trans_time) = #{year} AND t.`username` = #{username} WHERE c.type = 1 AND c.level = 2 GROUP BY c.id, c.name

SELECT IFNULL(c.path,"undefined") AS categoryName, IFNULL(SUM(t.amount), 0) AS totalExpense, COUNT(t.id) AS count FROM T_TRANSACTION t LEFT JOIN t_category c ON c.id = t.cid WHERE t.type = 2 AND YEAR (t.trans_time) = #{year} AND t.`username` = #{username} GROUP BY c.id, c.name ORDER BY totalExpense DESC

SELECT IFNULL(c.name, '合计') AS "categoryName", SUM(CASE WHEN MONTH(t.trans_time)= 1 THEN t.amount ELSE 0 END) AS "month_1", SUM(CASE WHEN MONTH(t.trans_time)= 2 THEN t.amount ELSE 0 END) AS "month_2", SUM(CASE WHEN MONTH(t.trans_time)= 3 THEN t.amount ELSE 0 END) AS "month_3", SUM(CASE WHEN MONTH(t.trans_time)= 4 THEN t.amount ELSE 0 END) AS "month_4", SUM(CASE WHEN MONTH(t.trans_time)= 5 THEN t.amount ELSE 0 END) AS "month_5", SUM(CASE WHEN MONTH(t.trans_time)= 6 THEN t.amount ELSE 0 END) AS "month_6", SUM(CASE WHEN MONTH(t.trans_time)= 7 THEN t.amount ELSE 0 END) AS "month_7", SUM(CASE WHEN MONTH(t.trans_time)= 8 THEN t.amount ELSE 0 END) AS "month_8", SUM(CASE WHEN MONTH(t.trans_time)= 9 THEN t.amount ELSE 0 END) AS "month_9", SUM(CASE WHEN MONTH(t.trans_time)=10 THEN t.amount ELSE 0 END) AS "month_10", SUM(CASE WHEN MONTH(t.trans_time)=11 THEN t.amount ELSE 0 END) AS "month_11", SUM(CASE WHEN MONTH(t.trans_time)=12 THEN t.amount ELSE 0 END) AS "month_12", SUM(t.amount) AS "total" FROM T_CATEGORY c JOIN T_TRANSACTION t ON t.cid = c.id AND t.type = 2 AND YEAR (t.trans_time) = #{year} AND t.`username` = #{username} GROUP BY c.name WITH ROLLUP
